attributes.action: investigate the starvation response that returns all the weight we lose on a diet.
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to investigate the starvation response that returns all the weight we lose on a diet.  The starvation response is built into our genes.  People are blamed if they put the weight that they have lost on a diet back on again, but it is not their fault.  The government needs to search for a way to lose weight that does not activate the starvation response.
